backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, habit creation, and habit completion storage using stable maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI rename, logo update, and favicon tasks with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short descriptions of their roles in the updated SUTRA UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the SUTRA title and linking the generated favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, habit display, habit creation, and SUTRA-branded header and welcome UI.
frontend/src/components/CreateHabitModal: Modal component for creating a new habit with name and color selection.
frontend/src/components/EditDisplayNameM: Modal allowing users to update their display name with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/EditHabitModal.t: Modal for editing an existing habit's name and color using preset color options.
frontend/src/components/HabitCard.tsx: Renders a habit card with a 2‑week completion grid, edit/delete actions, and toggling of daily completions using optimistic updates.
frontend/src/components/HabitHistoryModa: Displays a 6‑month calendar view of a habit’s completion history with structured week layouts and completion lookups.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSection.t: Shows user profile info with login/logout, display name editing, and a dropdown menu tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for habits, completions, and mutations including optimistic completion toggling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with base styles, custom animations, scrollbar styling, and focus/transition utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus helpers to clear stored or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining content paths and extending the theme with an Inter-based font family.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the SUTRA project state, required assets, existing features, and pending requests.
